original_text: But if the female animals were weak, he did not put the branches in front of them when they had sex. As a result, the weak animals would belong to Laban, but Jacob would keep the strong animals.
korean_text: 약한 양이면 그 가지를 두지 아니하니 그렇게 함으로 약한 것은 라반의 것이 되고 튼튼한 것은 야곱의 것이 된지라

sentences.original_text: But if the female animals were weak
he did not put the branches in front of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들 앞에 나뭇가지를 두지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: the weak animals would belong to Laban
but Jacob would keep the strong animals
